import React from "react" export default function Swap() { const [chosenTokens, setChosenTokens] = React.useState({ "from": "Select", "to": "Select" }) const [inputAmounts, setInputAmounts] = React.useState({ "from": 0, "to": 0 }) function updateTokens(fromTo, token) { setChosenTokens(prevChosenTokens => { return { ...prevChosenTokens, [fromTo]: token } }) } function handleChange(event) { } return (

Swap

Select a token

updateTokens("from", "BTC")}>BTC updateTokens("from", "ETH")}>ETH updateTokens("from", "USDT")}>USDT

Select a token

updateTokens("to", "BTC")}>BTC updateTokens("to", "ETH")}>ETH updateTokens("to", "USDT")}>USDT
) }
